title: Maya & Filippo Make Friends in Auckland
description: Embark on an exciting adventure with Maya and Filippo as they travel around the globe on board the “Fun Princess” - a cruise ship full of surprises. Discover their fascinating ports of call, join them in activities at sea, and explore the magical world they create through the power of their thoughts. This time Maya and Filippo discover Auckland and meet different kinds of people depending on...read the book to find out! Create your own reality just like Maya and Filippo do. Start coloring the world the way you want it to be through the pages of this book. It all starts in your mind. You have the crayons - have fun with them and have fun with your life!
author: Alinka Rutkowska
